item.title: Pi adding pets (more information)
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

I am using an array or trying to that says

{pet, itemid}, {petid, itemid}

How would i go about the additem into inventory from pet id to item idâ€¦ this is where i get a little lost

my code:

public void petpickup(Client c, int id) { for (int i = 0; i < petArray.length; i++) if (petArray[i][0] == id) c.getItems().addItem(petArray[i][1], 1); for (int i = 0; i < Server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] == null) continue; if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == id) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].absX = 0; Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].absY = 0; } } c.hasNpc = false; }

=
